text: Li Fengqing also written as Li Feng-Ching is a Chinese former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Fengqing represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1966, as part of the Chinese team together with Ying Chun, Wang Shuyuan and Liu Liqin. After three distances she didn't qualify for the final 3000m and finished 22nd overall. She also competed at other international competitions, finishing second at a competition in Finland in 1965 and third at the country match between the Soviet Union and China in 1962. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Chinese female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Li Fengqing
